meanings.definition: Willing to do a service or favor without hesitation.
meanings.sent1: She was obligingly helpful when I needed assistance.
meanings.sent2: The obligingly neighbor offered to water my plants while I was away.
meanings.sent3: The obligingly cat brought me a toy as a gift.
meanings.sent4: The obligingly sun warmed the chilly morning with its rays.
meanings.sent5: The obligingly student volunteered to help clean up the classroom after school.

meanings.definition: In a helpful or accommodating manner.
meanings.sent1: He smiled obligingly and held the door open for her.
meanings.sent2: She nodded obligingly when asked to stay a bit longer.
meanings.sent3: The waiter obligingly brought extra napkins without being asked.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed obligingly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The dog wagged its tail obligingly as the child petted it gently.
